The council member nodded, "Yes, now should be a good time to be
prepared. A spy has informed me the Autobots are near leaving."
______________________________________________________________________
In a bar Slugslinger was nursing a cup of oil. He smiled, and continued
his speech, telling a robot beside him, of great victories in the path.
"Well, the Autobots never could look at me straight after that." He said
smilling. 

"Fascinating." The robot said in raspy tone, with kid like enthusiasm.
"Ever since the Decepticons began, I wanted to join, but was never able
to do good enough at the Decepticon battle academy." He turned his head
to the robot beside him. "Although I am suprised my brother never made
it." The robot just quietly downed his murky drink, and with red eyes
looked at the other two.
